articles.description: Wigan Warriors took depleted Hull FC to the cleaners with an 11-try rout
articles.content:
A Hull FC side down to their bare bones were completely outclassed as a merciless Wigan Warriors outfit ran out 60-0 winners on Friday night.
Australian winger Bevan French set a new Super League re… [+5437 chars]
